title: The Silent Echo

protagonist.name: Aarav
protagonist.consistent_char_prompt: A 12-year-old Indian boy with short black hair, wearing a simple blue shirt and khaki pants, with determined brown eyes and a thoughtful expression

setting: A small village in rural India, with traditional homes, bustling markets, and a backdrop of social tension
visual_style: Realistic digital painting with muted earth tones, subtle lighting to convey mood, and detailed cultural elements like traditional clothing and architecture
plot_summary: Aarav witnesses his older sister's struggle with dowry demands and domestic violence after her marriage. He learns about the legal rights and support systems available, and with the help of a local women's group, he courageously speaks out to seek justice and empower his family and community.
negative_prompt: low quality, blurry, warped, extra fingers, text, watermark, bad anatomy, overly cartoonish, bright colors, unrealistic violence, explicit content, distorted faces
